snippet: Russians are making a surprise hit out of a book that explains the minutiae of life in the United States, including the phenomenon of teenage baby sitters and unfortunate aversions to vodka.
abstract: Moscow Journal; Russians are making surprise hit out of Nikolai V Zlobin's book America--What a Life!, which explains minutiae of life in the United States, including phenomenon of teenage baby sitters and unfortunate aversions to vodka.
lead_paragraph: Russians are making a surprise hit out of a book that explains the minutiae of life in the United States, including the phenomenon of teenage baby sitters and unfortunate aversions to vodka.

headline.seo: Book Translates American Minutiae for Russians
headline.main: A Hunger for Tales of Life in the American Cul-de-Sac
headline.print_headline: A Hunger for Tales of Life in the American Cul-de-Sac
